entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Type test for ref struct is incorrect #63085
  • Auto add async to method signature feature improvement #63081
  • [Feature request]auto remove generic correspondent angle brackets #63080
  • Move argument name hints to top of argument instance [C#] #63079
  • Remove or reduce use of `ParameterSymbol.DeclaredScope` #63078
  • C# Automatic String Interpolation Syntax "$" #63077
  • Display inherited comments #63075
  • Peek Implementation for interfaces #63074
  • Add optional argument name code style #63073
  • About automatic formatting commas #63072
  • Display tooltips for doc comments that don't have summary tags #63071
  • Mark parameter from metadata with ScopedRefAttribute and UnscopedRefAttribute as invalid #63070
    17.4
  • Report error for `[UnscopedRef] scoped` parameter #63057
  • [API proposal]: GetDeclaredSymbol for lambdas #63051
    17.4
  • "Disabled" severity in EditorConfig UI doesn't work #63050
    17.4
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicArgumentProvider.TabTabCompletionWithArguments #63043
    17.4
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpSquigglesNetCore.VerifySyntaxErrorSquiggles #63042
    17.4
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicErrorListNetCore.ErrorList #63041
    17.4
  • Checksum algorithm set by `GeneratorContexts.AddSource` should be overridden by `/checksumalgorithm` switch #63039
    17.4

Closed

  • Find all references that might change its value #63076
  • Value tracking continues to work after closing solution or even changing solution #59423
    17.3
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found #62719
  • CS0305 compiler error false trigger? #63053

PullRequests

Created

  • Put correct function call for Return Attributes #63084
    Area-IDE
  • Handle scenario where initial completion list contains only a single non-roslyn item #63083
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Enable updated escape rules if System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields exists (#62304)" #63082
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] Partition integration tests #63067
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Auto-default ref fields with a null ref-assignment #63065
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" (#62759) #63063
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add option to skip source link and embedded source #63054
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow using ScopedRef in source #63046
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Switch to value-tasks in a few oop syncing points. #63056
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Deregister workspaces from LSP when they are disposed of #63025
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • allow us to build windows tfms on unix #63059
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add threading asserts to rename #63068
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Small pieces of rename serialization cleanup #63066
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to a simpler form of checksum->solution caching in the remote workspace layer. (2) #63028
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove a bunch of duplication in our telemetry logging #63033
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Obsolete ITemporaryStorageService public APIs #62998
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix request snapshot bug for languages without an LSP server implementation #63031
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63049
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63047
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63052
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63048
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [FabricBot] Automatically close generated PR tagger issues #63040
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Skip failing integration tests #63027
    Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat, Next
  • Rename parameter for clarity #63023
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #62961
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63037
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #62854
    Area-IDE
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Don't complete parenthesis after 'new' if the type has nested types #63015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • [Test] Add back support for incremental background analysis for method body editing scenarios #63017
    Area-Analyzers
  • Check the right matches in lambdas #63006
    Area-Interactive
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix SuppressMessage not working on lambdas #62970
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review
  • Assert unnecessary analyzers derive from AbstractBuiltInUnnecessaryCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62944
    Area-IDE, Community
  • FindMethodSymbolInType - handle the case when a type definition is resolved to a type in a different module. #62865
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE
